blocks.text: This dashboard provides a generic and a detailed view on your Open and Overdue Invoices.

Structure of the Dashboard
  Page 1 - Overview: Leading KPIs, a process discovery widget and a business case calculator 
  Page 2 - Impact: Overview of all Open and Overdue Invoices and their impact on ITP process
  Page 3 - Root Causes: Deep dive into possible blockers causing delays in clearing Invoices
  Page 4 - Take Action: A collection of ideas to tackle the drivers of inefficiencies
  Page 5 - Case Details: An exportable list of open Invoices and their most important attributes that can be filtered.
Please see our Dashboard Documentation for more information on how to manage your dashboards.

If you find this dashboard helpful, please feel free to share your feedback in terms of improvements, wishes, and problems. We are constantly improving and extending our standard dashboard templates to provide you with the best experience possible. You can submit your feedback here.
For a more detailed analysis of key process areas, see other available dashboards.

children.name: Number of Open Overdue Invoices
children.description: Invoices with past Due Date

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE ("Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" IS NULL)
	AND "Last Inv. Item Due Date" < DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()))
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Open Overdue Invoice Value
children.description: Value of Invoices without a Clearing Date and past Due Dates

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
SUM("Inv. Converted USD Amount")  FILTER (
	WHERE ("Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" IS NULL)
    AND "Last Inv. Item Due Date" < DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()))
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Open Invoices that are due in the next 7 days
children.description: Invoices without Clearing Date due in the next 7 days

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE ("Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" IS NULL)
    AND "Last Inv. Item Due Date"- DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) > DURATION '0DAYS'
    AND "Last Inv. Item Due Date"- DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) <= DURATION '7DAYS'
 )
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Open Invoice Value that is due in the next 7 Days
children.description: Value of Invoices without a Clearing Date and Due Date within 7 days

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
CASE WHEN (SUM("Inv. Converted USD Amount") FILTER (
	WHERE ("Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" IS NULL
    AND "Last Inv. Item Due Date"- DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) > DURATION '0DAYS'
    AND "Last Inv. Item Due Date"- DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) <= DURATION '7DAYS'
	)
)) IS NULL THEN  0 
ELSE 
SUM("Inv. Converted USD Amount") FILTER (
	WHERE ("Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" IS NULL
    AND "Last Inv. Item Due Date"- DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) > DURATION '0DAYS'
    AND "Last Inv. Item Due Date"- DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) <= DURATION '7DAYS'
	)
)
END
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Open Invoice Value
children.description: Total value of Invoices without a Clearing Date

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
SUM("Inv. Converted USD Amount")  FILTER (
	WHERE ("Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" IS NULL)
	)
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Open Overdue Invoices by Vendor
children.description: Overview of distribution of Open Overdue Invoices, grouped by Vendor

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
"Last Inv. Item Vendor Name" AS "Vendor"
,SUM ("Inv. Converted USD Amount") AS "Invoice Value in $"
,COUNT(case_id) AS "No. of Invoices"
FROM "THIS_PROCESS"
WHERE ("Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" IS NULL)
  AND "Last Inv. Item Due Date" < DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) 
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 2 DESC
LIMIT 10

children.name: Open Invoices with Due Date within 7 Days
children.description: Number of Invoices without Clearing Date and are due in the next 7 days

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE ("Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" IS NULL)
	AND "Last Inv. Item Due Date"- DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) > DURATION '0DAYS'
    AND "Last Inv. Item Due Date"- DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) <= DURATION '7DAYS'
   )
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Open Invoice Value
children.description: Total value of Invoices without a Clearing Date

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
SUM("Inv. Converted USD Amount")  FILTER (
	WHERE ("Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" IS NULL)
	)
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Open Invoice Value with Due Date within 7 Days
children.description: Value of Invoices without a Clearing Date and past Due Dates

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
CASE WHEN (SUM("Inv. Converted USD Amount") FILTER (
	WHERE ("Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" IS NULL
    AND "Last Inv. Item Due Date"- DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) > DURATION '0DAYS'
    AND "Last Inv. Item Due Date"- DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) <= DURATION '7DAYS'
	)
)) IS NULL THEN 0 
ELSE 
SUM("Inv. Converted USD Amount") FILTER (
	WHERE ("Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" IS NULL
    AND "Last Inv. Item Due Date"- DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) > DURATION '0DAYS'
    AND "Last Inv. Item Due Date"- DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) <= DURATION '7DAYS'
	)
)
END
FROM THIS_PROCESS

dataSource.query:

SUM("Inv. Converted USD Amount")  FILTER (
	WHERE ("Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" IS NULL)

blocks.text:
Definition:
An Invoice is considered as "Open Overdue" when it has been not cleared yet, but the due date is in the past .
"Last FI Invoice Item Clearing Date" IS NULL AND "Last FI Invoice Item Due Date" < DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW())

children.name: Open Overdue Invoices by Purchasing Organization
children.description: Overview of distribution of Open Overdue Invoices, grouped by Purchasing Organization

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
"Last PO Purchasing Organization" AS "Purchasing Organization"
,SUM ("Inv. Converted USD Amount") AS "Invoice Value in $"
,COUNT(case_id) AS "No. of Invoices"
FROM "THIS_PROCESS"
WHERE ("Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" IS NULL)
  AND "Last Inv. Item Due Date" < DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) 
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 2 DESC
LIMIT 10

children.name: Open and Overdue Payments Overview, sorted by Open Invoice Value per Company and  Vendor
children.description: This table shows the Open and Overdue Payments sorted by the Invoice Value

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
"Inv. Company Code" AS "Company Code"
,"Last Inv. Item Vendor Number" AS "Vendor Number"
,"Last Inv. Item Vendor Name" AS "Vendor Name"
,"Last Inv. Item Vendor Country" AS "Vendor Country"
,"Last PO Purchasing Group"
,"Last PO Type"
,"Last PO Item Material Group"
,"Last PO Item Plant Name"
,COUNT(case_id) AS "No. of Open Invoices"
,SUM ("Inv. Converted USD Amount") AS "Open Invoice Value in $"
,COUNT(case_id) FILTER
( WHERE "Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" IS NULL
  AND "Last Inv. Item Due Date" < DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) )
  AS "No. of Open Overdue Invoices"
,SUM ("Inv. Converted USD Amount") FILTER
( WHERE "Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" IS NULL
  AND "Last Inv. Item Due Date" < DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) )
  AS "Open Overdue Invoice Value in $"
FROM "THIS_PROCESS"
WHERE ("Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" IS NULL)

GROUP BY 1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8
ORDER BY 10 DESC

children.name: Open Overdue Invoice Rate
children.description: Percent of Open Overdue Invoices compared to all Invoices

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE ("Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" IS NULL)
	AND "Last Inv. Item Due Date" < DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW())) / COUNT(case_id) * 100
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Number of Open Invoices
children.description: Number of Open Invoices

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE ("Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" IS NULL)
	) 
FROM THIS_PROCESS

FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Rate of Open Overdue Invoices to all open Invoices
children.description: Percentage of Open Overdue Invoices to all Open Invoices

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
  COUNT (case_id)  FILTER (
	WHERE "Last Inv. Item Due Date" < DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) 
    AND "Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" IS NULL) 
    /
  count (case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE "Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" IS NULL
	) * 100
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Cleared Invoices
children.description: Number of Cleared Invoices

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
  COUNT (case_id)  FILTER (
	WHERE "Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" IS NOT NULL
    )
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Ready to Pay Invoices
children.description: Number of open posted Invoices without a Payment Block

dataSource.query:
SELECT count(case_id)
FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES('Post Invoice')
AND ("Last Inv. Item Payment Block Key" IS NULL 
   OR event_name MATCHES('Released Payment Block'))
AND "Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" IS NULL
)
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Rate of Ready to Pay Invoices
children.description: Percentage of open posted Invoices without a Payment Block to all open Invoices

dataSource.query:
SELECT count(case_id)
FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES('Post Invoice')
AND ("Last Inv. Item Payment Block Key" IS NULL 
   OR event_name MATCHES('Released Payment Block'))
AND "Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" IS NULL) 
/ count (case_id) FILTER (
WHERE "Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" IS NULL
)
* 100
FROM THIS_PROCESS

blocks.text:
Definition:
An Invoice is considered as "Open Overdue" when it was not cleared yet, but the due date is in the past already.
"Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" IS NULL AND "Last Inv. Item Due Date" < DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW())

children.name: Open Overdue Invoices by Purchasing Organization (Top-10)
children.description: Overview of Top-10 Open Overdue Invoices, grouped by Purchasing Organization and sorted by Invoice Amount in USD

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
"Last PO Purchasing Organization" AS "Purchasing Organization"
,SUM ("Inv. Converted USD Amount") AS "Invoice Value in $"
,COUNT(case_id) AS "Number of Invoices"
FROM "THIS_PROCESS"
WHERE ("Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" IS NULL)
  AND "Last Inv. Item Due Date" < DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) 
  AND "Inv. Converted USD Amount" > 0
  AND "Last PO Purchasing Organization" IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 2 DESC
LIMIT 10

children.name: Due Date bucketing
children.description: This table buckets the open Invoices based on their Due Date

dataSource.query:
SELECT
"Inv. Company Code Text" AS "Company Code"
,"Last Inv. Item Vendor Number" AS "Vendor Number"
,"Last Inv. Item Vendor Name" AS "Vendor Name"
,"Last Inv. Item Vendor Country" AS "Vendor Country"
,"Inv. Accounting Document Number" AS "Invoice Number"
,"Inv. Fiscal Year"
,"Inv. Accounting Document Number"
,"Last Inv. Item Due Date" AS "Due date"
,"Last Inv. Item Due Date" - DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) AS "Days until due date"
,CASE

WHEN (DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) - "Last Inv. Item Due Date" > DURATION '0day') 
AND  (DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) - "Last Inv. Item Due Date" <= DURATION '3day') THEN 'Due date passed 1-3 days'  
WHEN ( DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) - "Last Inv. Item Due Date" > DURATION '3day') 
AND  (DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) - "Last Inv. Item Due Date" <= DURATION '7day') THEN 'Due date passed 3-7 days'  
WHEN (DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) - "Last Inv. Item Due Date" > DURATION '7day') 
AND  (DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) - "Last Inv. Item Due Date" <= DURATION '15day') THEN 'Due date passed 7-15 days'  
WHEN (DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) - "Last Inv. Item Due Date" > DURATION '15day') 
AND  (DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) - "Last Inv. Item Due Date" <= DURATION '30day') THEN 'Due date passed 15-30 days'
WHEN (DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) - "Last Inv. Item Due Date" > DURATION '30day') THEN 'Due date passed 30+ days'

WHEN "Last Inv. Item Due Date" - DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) = DURATION '0day' THEN 'Due today'

WHEN ("Last Inv. Item Due Date" - DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) > DURATION '0day') 
AND ("Last Inv. Item Due Date" - DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) <= DURATION '3day') THEN 'Due date in 1-3 days'  
WHEN ("Last Inv. Item Due Date" - DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) > DURATION '3day') 
AND ("Last Inv. Item Due Date" - DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) <= DURATION '7day') THEN 'Due date in 3-7 days'  
WHEN ("Last Inv. Item Due Date" - DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) > DURATION '7day') 
AND ("Last Inv. Item Due Date" - DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) <= DURATION '15day') THEN 'Due date in 7-15 days'  
WHEN ("Last Inv. Item Due Date" - DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) > DURATION '15day') 
AND ("Last Inv. Item Due Date" - DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) <= DURATION '30day') THEN 'Due date in 15-30 days'
WHEN ("Last Inv. Item Due Date" - DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) > DURATION '30day') THEN 'Due date in 30+ days'
END AS "Due dates"

FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE "Last Inv. Item Due Date" IS NOT NULL
AND "Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" IS NULL
AND "Inv. Accounting Document Number" IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY 10 DESC

children.name: Blocked Invoices
children.description: Open Invoices currently blocked

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
(COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
WHERE event_name MATCHES('Post Invoice' ~> NOT 'Remove Payment Block')
 AND "Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" IS NULL
 AND "Last Inv. Item Payment Block Key" IS NOT NULL))
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Rate of Blocked Invoices (historically)
children.description: Cases having a value set for 'Last Inv. Item Payment Block Key' for all cases including  Cleared Invoices

dataSource.query:
SELECT
count (case_id) 
FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES('Post Invoice' ~> 'Remove Payment Block')) 
/ count (case_id) * 100
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: AVG Cycle Time from Create PO Item to Create Invoice
children.description: Average time spent between PO Item creation and Invoice creation by Vendor

dataSource.query:
SELECT
AVG(
(SELECT LAST("end_time") FILTER (WHERE "event_name" IN ('Vendor Creates Invoice')))
-
(SELECT FIRST("end_time") FILTER (WHERE ("event_name" IN ('Create PO Item')) ))
) AS "Lead Time"
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: AVG Cycle Time from Posting till Remove Payment Block
children.description: Average time spent between Posting and Remove Payment Block

dataSource.query:
SELECT
AVG(
(SELECT LAST("end_time") FILTER (WHERE "event_name" IN ('Remove Payment Block')))
-
(SELECT FIRST("end_time") FILTER (WHERE ("event_name" IN ('Post Invoice')) ))
) AS "Lead Time"
FROM THIS_PROCESS

-- Posting till Release Payment Block +
-- Time from Creation by Venfor till it is posted

children.name: AVG Cycle Time from Creation by Vendor till Post Invoice
children.description: Average Time spent between Creation by Vendor and Post Invoice

dataSource.query:
SELECT
AVG(
(SELECT LAST("end_time") FILTER (WHERE "event_name" IN ('Post Invoice')))
-
(SELECT FIRST("end_time") FILTER (WHERE ("event_name" IN ('Vendor Creates Invoice')) ))
) AS "Lead Time"
FROM THIS_PROCESS

-- Posting till Release Payment Block +
-- Time from Creation by Venfor till it is posted

children.name: AVG Cycle Time from Manually Blocking and Removing Payment Block
children.description: Average time spent between Setting and Removing Payment Block Manually

dataSource.query:
SELECT
AVG(
(SELECT LAST("end_time") FILTER (WHERE ("event_name" IN ('Remove Payment Block')
AND "Event Created By User Type" IN ('Dialog'))))
-
(SELECT FIRST("end_time") FILTER (WHERE ("event_name" IN ('Set Payment Block') 
AND "Event Created By User Type" IN ('Dialog'))))
) AS "Lead Time"
FROM  THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Rate of Blocked Open Invoices
children.description: Cases running through "set payment block" but have not met "remove payment block" for all open invoices

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
(COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
WHERE event_name MATCHES('Post Invoice' ~> NOT 'Remove Payment Block')
AND "Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" IS NULL
AND "Last Inv. Item Payment Block Key" IS NOT NULL)/ COUNT(case_id) 
FILTER (WHERE "Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" IS NULL))* 100
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Value of Blocked Invoices
children.description: Value of Blocked Invoices in USD

dataSource.query:
SELECT
(SUM("Inv. Converted USD Amount") 
FILTER (
WHERE event_name MATCHES('Post Invoice' ~> NOT 'Remove Payment Block')
AND "Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" IS NULL
AND "Last Inv. Item Payment Block Key" IS NOT NULL)/ COUNT(case_id) 
FILTER (WHERE "Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" IS NULL))* 100
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Invoices that are due in the next 7 days or Overdue
children.description: This table shows the list of Invoices that are either Overdue or due in the next 7 days based on column - "Last Inv. Item Due Date"  <= 7 Days from the current Day (Today)

columnConfigurations.columnName: Last Inv. Item Due Date - DATE_TRUNC(["day", "NOW"])

dataSource.query:
SELECT DISTINCT
"Inv. Company Code Text" AS "Company Code"
,"Last Inv. Item Vendor Number" AS "Vendor Number"
,"Last Inv. Item Vendor Name" AS "Vendor Name"
,"Last Inv. Item Vendor Country" AS "Vendor Country"
,"Inv. Accounting Document Number" AS "Invoice Number"
,"Inv. Fiscal Year" 
,"Last Inv. Item Due Date"
,"Last Inv. Item Due Date" - DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) AS "Days until due date"
,SUM("Inv. Converted USD Amount") AS "Invoice Amount in $"

FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE ("Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" IS NULL)
AND "Inv. Posting Document Date" IS NOT NULL
AND "Inv. Accounting Document Number" IS NOT NULL
AND "Last Inv. Item Due Date" IS NOT NULL
AND "Last Inv. Item Due Date"- DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) <= DURATION '7DAYS'
ORDER BY 6 ASC

children.name: Open Overdue Invoices by Company Code (Top-10)
children.description: Overview of Top-10 Open Overdue Invoices, grouped by Company Code and sorted by Invoice Amount in USD

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
"Inv. Company Code Text" AS "Company Code Name"
,SUM ("Inv. Converted USD Amount") AS "Invoice Value in $"
,COUNT(case_id) AS "Number of Invoices"
FROM "THIS_PROCESS"
WHERE ("Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" IS NULL)
  AND "Last Inv. Item Due Date" < DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) 
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 2 DESC
LIMIT 10

children.name: Open Invoices by Payment Block (Top-10)
children.description: Overview of Top-10 Open Overdue Invoices, grouped by Payment Block and sorted by Number of Invoices

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
"Last Inv. Item Payment Block Key"  AS "Payment Block"
,COUNT(case_id) AS "Number of Invoices"
,SUM ("Inv. Converted USD Amount") AS "Invoice Value in $"
FROM "THIS_PROCESS"
WHERE   "Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" IS NULL
  AND "Last Inv. Item Payment Block Key" IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 3 DESC
LIMIT 10

children.name: Process Inefficiencies leading to Overdue Payments
children.description: This table shows inefficiencies such as Rework Rate, Change Rate, Average Payment Block Rate and Average Days from Invoice Posting to Due Date

dataSource.query:
SELECT
"Inv. Company Code Text" AS "Company Code"
,"Last Inv. Item Vendor Number" AS "Vendor Number"
,"Last Inv. Item Vendor Name" AS "Vendor Name"
,"Last Inv. Item Vendor Country" AS "Vendor Country"
,"Invoice Amount in $"
,"No. of Invoices"
,"Avg. Payment Block Rate in %"
,"Avg. days from Posting to Due Date"
,"Rework Rate in %"
,"Change Rate in %"
FROM
	(SELECT
       "Inv. Company Code Text" 
	  ,"Last Inv. Item Vendor Number" 
	  ,"Last Inv. Item Vendor Name"
	  ,"Last Inv. Item Vendor Country"
	 
	  ,SUM("Inv. Converted USD Amount") AS "Invoice Amount in $"    
      ,COUNT(case_id) AS "No. of Invoices"
      ,AVG("Payment Block Rate") AS "Avg. Payment Block Rate in %"
	  ,AVG("Last Inv. Item Due Date" - "Inv. Posting Document Date") AS "Avg. days from posting to due date"
      ,COUNT(case_id) FILTER(WHERE "Inv. Creation User Type" = 'System' AND event_name MATCHES('Post Invoice'))/COUNT("Inv. Accounting Document Number")*100 AS "Automatic Invoice Posting in %"
      ,COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE(SELECT BOOL_OR (occurrence > 1)FROM(SELECT OCCURRENCE(event_name) AS occurrence) AS sub))/COUNT("Inv. Accounting Document Number")*100 AS "Rework Rate in %"
	  ,COUNT(case_id) FILTER(WHERE event_name MATCHES (ILIKE '%update%'))/COUNT("Inv. Accounting Document Number") * 100 AS "Change Rate in %"
	  FROM
		  (SELECT DISTINCT
          	  case_id,
			 "Inv. Company Code Text" 
	  		 ,"Last Inv. Item Vendor Number" 
	  		 ,"Last Inv. Item Vendor Name"
	  		 ,"Last Inv. Item Vendor Country"
	         ,"Inv. Accounting Document Number" 
		     ,"Inv. Fiscal Year" 
             ,COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Remove Payment Block'))/ COUNT(case_id) * 100 AS "Payment Block Rate" 
			 ,"Inv. Accounting Document Number"
			 ,"Inv. Converted USD Amount"
			 ,"Last Inv. Item Due Date"
			 ,"Last Inv. Item Clearing Date"
             ,"Inv. Posting Document Date"
             ,"Inv. Creation User Type"
             ,"event_name"
             FROM "THIS_PROCESS"
		   WHERE  ("Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" IS NULL) 
           AND "Last Inv. Item Due Date" < DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) 
           AND "Last Inv. Item Due Date" IS NOT NULL
          ) AS SUB1
		  
	) AS SUB2
		  ORDER BY 5 desc

children.name: Open Invoice Aging
children.description: Open Invoices grouped by Company Code and Aging

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  CASE

  WHEN (DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) - "Last Inv. Item Due Date" > DURATION '0day') 
  AND  (DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) - "Last Inv. Item Due Date" <= DURATION '3day') THEN 'a. Due date passed 1-3 days'  
  WHEN ( DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) - "Last Inv. Item Due Date" > DURATION '3day') 
  AND  (DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) - "Last Inv. Item Due Date" <= DURATION '7day') THEN 'b. Due date passed 3-7 days'  
  WHEN (DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) - "Last Inv. Item Due Date" > DURATION '7day') 
  AND  (DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) - "Last Inv. Item Due Date" <= DURATION '15day') THEN 'c. Due date passed 7-15 days'  
  WHEN (DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) - "Last Inv. Item Due Date" > DURATION '15day') 
  AND  (DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) - "Last Inv. Item Due Date" <= DURATION '30day') THEN 'd. Due date passed 15-30 days'
  WHEN (DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) - "Last Inv. Item Due Date" > DURATION '30day') THEN 'e. Due date passed in 30+ days'
  
  WHEN "Last Inv. Item Due Date" - DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) = DURATION '0day' THEN 'f. Due today'

  WHEN ("Last Inv. Item Due Date" - DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) > DURATION '0day') 
  AND ("Last Inv. Item Due Date" - DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) <= DURATION '3day') THEN 'g. Due date in 1-3 days'  
  WHEN ("Last Inv. Item Due Date" - DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) > DURATION '3day') 
  AND ("Last Inv. Item Due Date" - DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) <= DURATION '7day') THEN 'h. Due date in 3-7 days'  
  WHEN ("Last Inv. Item Due Date" - DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) > DURATION '7day') 
  AND ("Last Inv. Item Due Date" - DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) <= DURATION '15day') THEN 'i. Due date in 7-15 days'  
  WHEN ("Last Inv. Item Due Date" - DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) > DURATION '15day') 
  AND ("Last Inv. Item Due Date" - DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) <= DURATION '30day') THEN 'j. Due date in 15-30 days'
  WHEN ("Last Inv. Item Due Date" - DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) > DURATION '30day') THEN 'k. Due date in 30+ days'
 
 END AS "Due dates"
 ,COUNT(case_id) as "# of Invoices"
 
FROM THIS_PROCESS

WHERE "Last Inv. Item Due Date" IS NOT NULL
AND "Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" IS NULL
AND "Inv. Accounting Document Number" IS NOT NULL

ORDER BY 2 ASC

children.name: Open Invoices that are due in the next 7 days
children.description: Number of Invoices without Clearing Date and are due in the next 7 days

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE ("Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" IS NULL)
    AND "Last Inv. Item Due Date"- DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) > DURATION '0DAYS'
    AND "Last Inv. Item Due Date"- DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) <= DURATION '7DAYS'
   )
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Open Invoice Value
children.description: Total value of Invoices without a Clearing Date

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
SUM("Inv. Converted USD Amount")  FILTER (
	WHERE ("Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" IS NULL)
	)
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Open Invoice Value that is due in the next 7 days
children.description: Value of Invoices without Clearing Date and due in the next 7 days

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
CASE WHEN (SUM("Inv. Converted USD Amount") FILTER (
	WHERE ("Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" IS NULL
    AND "Last Inv. Item Due Date"- DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) > DURATION '0DAYS'
    AND "Last Inv. Item Due Date"- DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) <= DURATION '7DAYS'
	)
)) IS NULL THEN 0 
ELSE 
SUM("Inv. Converted USD Amount") FILTER (
	WHERE ("Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" IS NULL
    AND "Last Inv. Item Due Date"- DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) > DURATION '0DAYS'
    AND "Last Inv. Item Due Date"- DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) <= DURATION '7DAYS'
	)
)
END
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Number of Open Overdue Invoices
children.description: Number of all open Overdue Invoices in the Data Set

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE ("Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" IS NULL)
	AND "Last Inv. Item Due Date" < DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()))
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Open Overdue Invoice Value
children.description: Value of Invoices without a Clearing Date and past Due Dates

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
SUM("Inv. Converted USD Amount")  FILTER (
	WHERE ("Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" IS NULL)
    AND "Last Inv. Item Due Date" < DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()))
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Take Action on Open Invoices that are due soon or overdue

blocks.text:
- The below tables show Invoices that are due in the next 7 days or overdue. 
- These tables are sorted by the "Days until Due Date" and can be exported to .csv file.

children.name: Last 3 Events for Open and Overdue Invoices
children.description: This tables shows the last three Events for Open and Overdue Invoices

dataSource.query:
SELECT case_id
,"P1" AS "Last event"
,LAST("P2") AS "Event before Last Event"
,LAST("P3") AS "Third Last Event" 
,("end time" - (DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()))) AS "Elapsed time since last event"
FROM (
  SELECT 
  case_id
  ,LAST(END_TIME) as "end time"
  ,LAST("event_name") AS "P1"
  ,LAG("event_name", 1) OVER (PARTITION BY "case_id" ORDER BY "end_time" ASC) AS "P2"
  ,LAG("event_name", 2) OVER (PARTITION BY "case_id" ORDER BY "end_time" ASC) AS "P3"
  FROM FLATTEN(THIS_PROCESS)
  WHERE ("Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" IS NULL)
    AND "Inv. Accounting Document Number" IS NOT NULL
    -- filter over due invoices only.
    AND ("Last Inv. Item Due Date" - DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) < DURATION '0day')
  ORDER BY 1 ASC
) AS "T"
ORDER BY 5 ASC

children.name: Due and Overdue Invoices within the next 7 Days
children.description: This table shows all due and overdue Invoices within the next 7 Days, based on the expression  "Last Inv. Item Due Date"  <= 7 days (from today on)

columnConfigurations.columnName: Last Inv. Item Due Date - DATE_TRUNC(["day", "NOW"])

dataSource.query:
SELECT DISTINCT
"Inv. Company Code Text" AS "Company Code"
,"Last Inv. Item Vendor Number" AS "Vendor Number"
,"Last Inv. Item Vendor Name" AS "Vendor Name"
,"Last Inv. Item Vendor Country" AS "Vendor Country"
,"Inv. Accounting Document Number" AS "Invoice Number"
,"Inv. Fiscal Year" 
,"Last Inv. Item Due Date"
,"Last Inv. Item Due Date" - DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) AS "Days until due date"
,SUM("Inv. Converted USD Amount") AS "Invoice Amount in $"

FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE ("Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" IS NULL)
AND "Inv. Posting Document Date" IS NOT NULL
AND "Inv. Accounting Document Number" IS NOT NULL
AND "Last Inv. Item Due Date" IS NOT NULL
AND "Last Inv. Item Due Date"- DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) <= DURATION '7DAYS'
ORDER BY 6 ASC

children.name: Invoice Details
children.description: The table lists all Invoices and their related Details (to export or sort them by colums)

dataSource.query:
SELECT
case_id
,"Inv. Company Code Text" AS "Company Code"
,"Last Inv. Item Vendor Number" AS "Vendor Number"
,"Last Inv. Item Vendor Name" AS "Vendor Name"
,"Last Inv. Item Vendor Country" AS "Vendor Country"
,"Inv. Accounting Document Number" AS "Invoice Number"
,"Inv. Fiscal Year"
,"Inv. Converted USD Amount" AS "Invoice Amount in $"
,"Inv. Converted USD Amount Eligible for Cash Discount" 
,"Inv. Document Type Text" AS "Doc Type" 
,"Inv. Company Code Text" AS "Company Code" 
,"Last Inv. Item G/L Account Number" AS "G/L Account Number"
,"Last Inv. Item Vendor Name" 
,"Inv. Posting Document Date" AS "Posting Date"
,"Last Inv. Item Clearing Entry Date" AS "Clearing Entry Date"
,"Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" AS "Clearing Date"
,"Last Inv. Item Due Date" AS "Due Date"
,"Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 1" AS "Last Cash Discount Days 1"
,"Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Days 2" AS "Last Cash Discount Days 2"
,"Last Inv. Item Payment Block Key" AS "Current Payment Block"
-- aggregated KPIsm
,AVG((SELECT LAST(END_TIME)) - (SELECT FIRST(END_TIME))) AS "Total Cycle Time"
,AVG((SELECT LAST(END_TIME)) - (DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()))) AS "Days fro Since Last Activ"
FROM "THIS_PROCESS"
WHERE "Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" IS NULL
AND "Inv. Accounting Document Number" IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY 10 desc
Limit 10
